resources.string: 1. What is the first thing to do when waking up in the morning?
2. Is there anything particular to do after eating the breakfast?
Brush teeth and get dressed for the kindergarten.
Yell that I don’t want to go to the kindergarten.
3. What is the daily plan at kindergarten?
Play around and learn new stuff with other cool kids, be nice and follow the daily schedule.
Entering the kindergarten tell that I want to go home and by the end of the day tell that I don’t want to go home.
4. What should I do with mom and dad after going home from the kindergarten?
Go to the beach and watch ships sailing away and ride a bike to the station to watch trains passing by.
Get some bite for the dinner and watch cartoon series.
5. What is the ritual before going to sleep?
Watch series of a cartoon and claim that I don’t want to sleep.
Get washed, brush teeth, read a book and give a good night hug to mum and dad.
